    • Constructor Detail

      • PokerGame

        public PokerGame(int ante,
                 int lowStake,
                 int highStake)
        Create a game of poker with the specified ante and stakes
        Parameters:
        ante - The ante for this game (0 or more)
        lowStake - The low stake for this game (1 or more, must be lower than highStake)
        highStake - The high stake for this game (2 or more, must be higher than lowStake)
